etapy.zamowienie_przyjeto_do_realizacji: Your order is now being processed.

opis1.1: Comfortable and discreet T-shirt for people with LVAD (Left Ventricular Assist Device) HeartMate heart pump.
opis1.2: Improve Your Comfort With Discreet LVAD Shirt Dedicated For Heartmate II and III Pump.

opis2.tresc:
An LVAD is a chance for a new life for patients with heart failure. It is more and more common to use continuous-flow pumps - HeartMate 2 and HeartMate 3. However, carrying a pump device in a bag can be bothersome and not always safe - luggage draws attention, it is heavy and uncomfortable, complicates daily activities, such as traveling. The alternative is the LVAD shirt - a t-shirt, thanks to which the pump is just next to you, safely hidden, and wearing the battery is discreet and risk-free.

Why you should have LVAD shirt?
  • The fabric: light, stretchy, pleasant to the skin, similar to those used in sports clothes (92% spandex, 8% cotton). The material wicks moisture very well and dries quickly.
  • Equipped with pockets with tabs in which you can safely hide the batteries, and at the same time distribute their weight evenly. No more shoulder and back pain that accompanied you while carrying the pump device in the bag.
  • LVAD shirt is universal - may be worn when inserting the driveline both from the right and left side.
  • 100% of discretion. LVAD clothing has a deep neckline, neutral color, no attention-grabbing prints. You can wear it under a sweater or jacket – t-shirt doesn’t stand out, you can easy match it with your clothing.
  • Designed for people with LVAD HeartMate II or HeartMate III pump, by patients suffering from heart failure and VAD experts.

LVAD clothes works perfectly, regardless of the situation - you can wear it every day for work or travel time. It is worn by patients in 18 countries around the world who appreciated the comfort that a LVAD vest provides them in everyday life.

koszyk.twoja koszulka powloka: Do you want your shirt to be more safe?
koszyk.Jak działa powłoka srebra?: Antibacterial silver coating silver ions in clothes
koszyk.Tresc:
Exceptionally strong bactericidal activity of the silver ions found its application in textile sector.

The clothes covered with silver coating are characterized by bacterio-static, lower the risk of bacterial and fungal infection as well as they eliminate the risk of unpleasant smell from occurring. The clothes containing silver are appreciated by the persons with susceptibility to have skin allergies, as preventing bacteria from developing and lower the risk from its ocurrence.

The clothes containing silver ions may also be helpful for the persons after mechanical device implantations supporting left heart ventricle (LVAD). Bacterial infections of the duct connecting the pump with the supply charger so called drive-line are one of the most often and very dangerous complications in a process of long-term therapy and any prophylaxis preventing from development of bacteria as the special clothes mentioned on which the silver anti-bacterial coating is placed, may be a helpful solution.

Antibacterial effect of silver has been known for years. Silver in a different form is used with treatment of burning or water disinfection.

In addition, the dressings containing silver are frequently used after surgical operations in order to protect the wound against bacterial infections.

High bactericidal effectiveness of silver ions is taken from its strong association with the structural proteins and enzyme bacterial cells. Leading to denaturation of these proteins, the silver causes the loss of its biological activity and pevents bacterial cells form functioning. It is worth mentioning that the bacteria very rare is resistant to silver, which cannot be said about other bactericidal agents.
